passages.content:
Industrial Sensor Maintenance Parts
- Optical Sensor (Type-A): $400
- Pressure Valve (Type-B): $250
- Controller Module (Type-C): $1,200
*Orders over $1,000 receive a 10% discount.
*Expedited shipping (next day): $50 flat rate.

From: Production Mgr
To: Purchasing Dept
Date: Feb 6

Following Tanaka-san's report, please order all 'Recommendation: Replace' items for Line 3 today. Use next-day shipping as Station 4 is currently down. We have been informed that the Controller Module (Type-C) is out of stock until next week, so just order the sensor for now. We will handle the module in a separate budget next month.

questions.q: What is the primary reason for the urgent order?
options: One part of the production line is not functioning.
The technician requested an upgrade to Type-C modules.
The European safety standards have changed.
questions.explanation: 文書3に「Station 4 is currently down（第4ステーションは現在停止中）」とあり、それに伴って「Replace immediately」の部品を急ぎで注文しているため、(B)が正解です。

questions.q: How much will the company pay for the order made on Feb 6?
questions.explanation: 文書3より「現時点ではセンサー（$400）のみ注文」し、「翌日配送（$50）」を利用します。合計 $450 です。モジュール（$1,200）は在庫切れで注文を見送ったため、10%割引（$1,000以上）は適用されません。

questions.q: What is indicated about the Controller Module?
options: It will be replaced immediately at Station 1.
It is no longer being manufactured.
It will not be purchased in the current order.
It is eligible for a volume discount if ordered with valves.
questions.explanation: 文書3の「so just order the sensor for now（今はセンサーだけ注文して）」および「module in a separate budget next month（モジュールは来月の別予算で）」という記述から、今回の注文には含まれないことがわかります。
